title: Need to contact the highest level of player behavior department
body:
Yeah so I just experienced the most wild bullshit I've ever seen. 
Need to talk to the highest manager that belongs to the Player Behavior department.

replies.body: You're always welcome to shoot them a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to start those conversations. Happy to take a look myself as well if you'd like!
I'm probably going to contest it under the new "Online Court" they just announced.
I just hope the person responsible gets fired.
You can contact Riot directly through [**Riot Support**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us).
